description: Moors Murderer Ian Brady reportedly asked in his will for his cremated ashes to be scattered on Glasgow's river Clyde and for money raised from publishing his memoirs to go to charity.
title: Moors Murderer Ian Brady reportedly asked for money from his memoirs to go to pet charity

author: Steve Robson, Stephen White
description: The Moors Murderer rejected suggestions that he had 'manipulated' Myra Hindley into carrying out their murderous spree
title: Ian Brady's confessions including how Myra was 'in tune' with him from the start

author: BBC News
description: The coroner at Ian Brady's inquest made the ruling after the Moors Murderer died on Monday.
title: Ian Brady's ashes 'not to be scattered at Saddleworth Moor'

author: Helen Pidd
description: At opening of inquest into child murderer’s death, coroner says it would be offensive if ashes were taken to Saddleworth Moor
title: Ian Brady's ashes must not be scattered on moor, says coroner

author: Sarah Whitehead
description: Ashworth hospital staff talk of difficulty in setting aside the crimes of the Moors murderer to treat him like any other patient
title: Ian Brady's psychiatric nurses speak of 'daily miracle' of treating him

author: Stephen White
description: The Moors Murderer wanted a guard of honour and a gangland-style funeral, but he will be cremated in front of a handful of officials and his remains disposed of near Ashworth security hospital
title: Sick Ian Brady demanded his ashes be scattered on the Moors with his victims

author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
description: Leading violent crime psychologist claims the Moors Murderer believed to be forgotten "was a fate worse than death" thrived off public power games
title: Ian Brady 'died as he lived - in complete control' violent crime expert reveals

author: Fred Harrison
description: Former Sunday People Chief reporter Fred Harrison tells of his chilling meetings with the Moors Murderer and how it convinced him that Hindley should never be released
title: Ian Brady confessed to me: Of course I’ve killed many more

author: Frances Perraudin
description: Murderer’s solicitor assures coroner that 79-year-old’s remains will not end up on moors where he and Myra Hindley buried victims
title: Ian Brady's ashes will not be scattered on Saddleworth Moor, lawyer confirms

author: Katie Butler
description: The Moors Murderer's inquest was held in the North West earlier this week but when asked if they would do it Sefton Council said 'the simple answer is no'
title: Councils across the country are refusing to cremate the body of Ian Brady
